title: Right Here Right Now
creator_credit: Franciscan Communication Centre, Karl Holtsnider and Bruce Baker
brief_description: A dramatisation of how a janitor in an apartment house reaches out to those around him. His understanding brings hope to lonely tenants, and this is used to illustrate the need to be concerned for our fellow beings.
